description: The Senate of Canada is seeking to establish a contract
tags: Hiring, consulting, and outsourcing contractors and consultants
full_summary:
=====================================

## Pre-Retirement Training Services
=====================================

The Senate of Canada is inviting qualified contractors to submit a proposal for Pre-Retirement Training Services.This contract will span three years, with the option to renew for up to two additional one-year periods.

### Tender Details
-------------------

*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01009485
*   **Publication Date:** October 13, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 14, 2022 (11:00 AM EDT)
*   **Contracting Authority:** Senate, The
    2 Rideau Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0A4, Canada
    Phone: 613-995-8888 x 4, Email: [Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca)

### Solicitation Details
-----------------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** SEN-038 22/23
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Contact Person:** Dina AlEryani, Email: [Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca)

### Annexes and Related Documents
---------------------------------

The solicitation includes the following annexes:

*   [English RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/af153ce55b9dc6a73df9ca5a25705a65/rfp_sen-038_2223_e.pdf)
*   [French RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/c136a54f679fb82e99db69a38718a731/dp_sen-038_2223_f.pdf)

Queries regarding the RFP must be submitted to the contracting authority by email no later than October 28, 2022 (11:00 am EDT). The answers to these queries will be made available to all bidders via the CanadaBuys website without revealing the source of the inquiry. Offerors must ensure that their proposal includes accurate references to the RFP number, as late or non-compliant proposals may be disqualified from bidding eligibility.   If you need help revising this document, please reply to
